## Color3.toArray() method

Stores in the given array from the given starting index the red, green, blue values as successive elements

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toArray(array: FloatArray, index?: number): Color3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>FloatArray</code> | defines the array where to store the r,g,b components |
|  index | <code>number</code> | defines an optional index in the target array to define where to start storing values |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color3`

the current Color3 object
